body_text: Is Highschool of the Dead on hiatus again? I was really happy when I heard that HoTD would be continued. And even happier when the first new chapter actually came. but now after several months of waiting there still has been no other chapter. So my question is, has HoTD gone on hiatus again ?
Does anyone know what happened to H.O.T.D? I really like the storyline, and I kinda miss it since the series hasn't released a new chapter in a long time.
